author: dankrad.eth
content: yes, any number >1/3 can block all signatures. But once we have withdrawal key exits, that isn't such a big problem anymore.

author: dankrad.eth
content: also, with >1/3 you can sign slashable messages if you can prevent the other parties from communicating with each other

author: adiasg
content:
It's also possible to fine-tune these thresholds to your requirements.
Eg, if you're more worried about nodes crashing and going offline than nodes becoming controlled by an attacker, then you can choose to tolerate up to 1/2 nodes crashing but only up to 1/4 nodes making conflicting votes.
